title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.3 - Taking nonemployees to institution departments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.3 - Taking nonemployees to institution departments

State Regulations

No employee shall be permitted to escort any person not
employed by the department to any of the institutional departments without
first being directed by, or having obtained the approval of, the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
